说明: Display: Controls whether to double-scaling (system scaling must be at least 150%)
Wether to display Manifest Black Sky Weapon
Whether Equipment switching mode is open
Data Output: Whether to synchronize the combination of output rank interface and damage data to csv when calculating
Debug Switch: Equipment properties are not counted. Weapon type is the first character weapon option
Change Theme style. DNFStyle: Dark Mode, LightStyle: Light Mode, None: No Theme
삼 각 차단 옵션 표시 여부
Weapon Ranking: Each weapon in the ranking appears only once
Check for updates: Whether to automatically check for updates when the software starts (check for updates manually after shutdown)
Elemental Dropper Aura: Whether to calculate defense and attribute resistance reduction?
Wesley's Tactical Set Extra Damage Switch
Spider Queen's Breath: Whether to calculate fixed defense reduction?
